  • Additional Notes: 750 Ti/1K≈30FPS, 750 Ti/720p≈60FPS, 1050, 1050ti/1K≈50FPS, 960/1K≈60FPS Steam Deck/1K≈50FPS ROG Ally/1K≈70FPS 1. Using FSR should further improve performance. 2. Windows 10 1909 requires launching with -dx11, It will sacrifice performance. We recommend updating Windows 10 to a version newer than 1909, launch using the default DX12.
